newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Average yield in Slovak c.bank repo hits 17.0 pct.
newsitem.headline: Average yield in Slovak c.bank repo hits 17.0 pct.

text.p: Average yield in a Slovak central bank (NBS) one-week repo tender on Tuesday hit 17.0 percent, the NBS said in a statement.
The NBS auctioned a fixed volume of one billion crowns. Overall bids in the tender totalled 3.850 billion crowns.
The NBS added 2.5 billion crowns into the local money market through a seven-day repo tender on Monday, with an average yield at 15.96 percent.
The central bank monitors market liquidity on a daily basis and decides each morning whether to hold any open market operations.
According to NBS figures, the Slovak banking sector lacked some 1.87 percent of the funds needed to meet minimum reserves requirements on July 14.
